pageContext.display_address: 9650 Foothills Canyon Blvd., Highlands Ranch, CO 80129
pageContext.geocode_address: 9650 South Foothills Canyon Boulevard, Littleton, CO 80129, USA
pageContext.public_note: These summer workshops are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Wednesday workshop will teach students how to build Castles & Catapults
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Simple machines help us do work everyday. In this class we focus on the lever by building a catapult. Change the movement of the lever by learning about the importance of the fulcrum. Then have some fun testing how far the catapult will launch!
